objects.name: title_Text
objects.string:
RoboQuest RQ-Sim-GDevelop 
* Kudos to 'GDevelop: Asteroids Example'

objects.name: Header_Txt_Object
objects.string:
Through our pioneering, online Adventure Academic App (AAA) Series, you will Pilot a RoboQuest Robotic Spaceship to Harvest Asteroids for Precious Gems (Minecraft-style), equipped with Rapid-Firing Organic-Projectiles and other Family-Friendly Devices.  
 
Through our Built-in ‘Play Smart/Work-Smart’ Quiz Questions, you will Engage in Missions to Explore College/High-School Robotic Concepts such as: 
* Differential-Steering for Navigational-Motion,
* H-Bridge Current-Polarity for Driving both Left & Right DC-Motors, and
* Pulse-Width-Modulation (PWM) to Control a Servo’s Rotation-Angle.
 
Also featured is our Online RoboQuest-Derby, where you engage in a friendly, high-adrenaline International Co-op Competition with other amazing students/pilots across the globe/galaxy.  ; ) 

Specs: 
* Chrome-Browser: Windows, macOS, iOS, Android, Linux
* Full-Stack Web w/ Peer-to-Peer & Google FireStore(FireBase)
* Multiplayer Drop-In Anytime

events.comment: If the restart game text is clicked, go back to the game scene
change color of restart text when the mouse is over the text

'Structure' can only host/parent Key-Value Dictionary Pair
* 'Array' can host/parent multiple child 'sub-structures'
Setup Once: Initialize global values: Volume was 30, bring lower to 15 or less, due to explosion too loud
'Key Released' more reliable than 'Key Pressed', for better key-debouncing
2021-0906: Best to not put checking for query results as a child-subevent, as too premature, not stable, best at same level as query with 'trigger once'
2021-0906: 'Random()' parameter is end-range-inclusive, which is human-friendly, and starts at 0
For 'rqSim_QuizQuestions', put questions not at document-level since non-editable, but at field-level, to be editable
Object Timer: Seconds per frame within Animation Sequence
2021-1012 Splitting text over two lines in a text-object can cause weird/skewed location on screen.  Avoid split-lines.
2021-1031 Arrays are forced to start with 0 and cannot have any gaps in index numbering.  Any gaps will have 'null', thus wasted record.  'Structures' are efficient, only indexes for valid records.
2021-1105 Send messages can contain variables/structures declared in scenes-only, and not declared in global.  Thus variables/structures in scenes most flexible/capable.  See below as example:
2021-1105 Does Pause but no way to unpause, best to use timescale=0 and 1
Relatively real-time, so keep timer delay at minimal: 0.1 = 10 triggers/sec, 0.2 = 5 triggers/sec, 0.4 = 2.5 trigger/sec
